thread.title: Sports Insider live at noon: Talking Browns-Ravens, Cavaliers preseason and Indians front office changes
thread.title_full: Sports Insider live at noon: Talking Browns-Ravens, Cavaliers preseason and Indians front office changes | cleveland.com

author: Dan Labbe, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Sports Insider live at noon: Talking Browns-Ravens, Cavaliers preseason and Indians front office changes
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- The Browns will try to salvage their season against Baltimore on Sunday. The Cavaliers preseason is in full swing. The Indians front office has a new look.
Join Chris Fedor and me for our live half-hour show, starting at noon, talking all things Cleveland sports.
Mary Kay Cabot will join us at noon to preview Browns-Ravens. Chris Haynes will talk about the Cavaliers preseason game last night and look ahead to tonight. Paul Hoynes will talk about the Indians new-look front office and preview the offseason.
Click play on the player above when the red "Live" icon appears on the bottom to watch the show. A complete archive of the show will be made available later today.
